attributes.action: Everyone whose theory test runs out 2020/21 should have  12 months extension
attributes.additional_details:
It is not fair in any person who could not sit a driving test 
As they were closed 
And now the backlog means thousands can not get a test bedroom the two years is up 
It is not their fault and deserve some let up on this
attributes.background: Let people have an extra 12 months to actually find and book a test

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567292

You might also like to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574669
